welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mahwah, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Teterboro Airport primarily serves private and corporate flights, with a separate entrance and facilities.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Teterboro Airport serves as a secondary hub for private and charter flights, with its own amenities and services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all the necessary facilities for travelers including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private or chartered planes, the private terminal offers a more luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orange County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for 2 hours per day.
